mapper.select: SELECT PRO.id as id, PRO.project_name as projectName, PRO.add_time as addTime, PRO.update_time as updateTime FROM proj_project PRO ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT id AS tagId, `name` AS tagName, (SELECT id FROM proj_label b WHERE a.parent_id = b.id) AS parentId, (SELECT `name` FROM proj_label c WHERE a.parent_id = c.id) AS parentName FROM proj_label AS a WHERE id = (SELECT proj_tag.tag_id FROM proj_tag JOIN proj_label ON proj_tag.tag_id = proj_label.id WHERE project_id = #{id})
